Package org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractArticleXml<T extends org.ambraproject.models.AmbraEntity>
    A holder for a piece (node or document) of NLM-format XML, which can be built into an entity.
    AbstractXpathReader
    A container for a node of XML data that reads it with XPath queries.
    ArticleXml
    An NLM-format XML document that can be "ingested" to build an Article object.
    AssetNodesByDoi
    A set of article XML nodes, each representing an asset, mapped by the asset's DOI.
    AssetXml
    Contains a whole article as an NLM-format XML document and extracts metadata for one asset.
    CitedArticleXml
    A holder for an NLM-format XML node that represents an article citation.
    ManifestXml
    Represents the manifest of an article .zip archive.
    XpathReader
    Implementation of XPathExtractor.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidXPathException
    Indicate that a constant, program-defined XPath expression could not be compiled.
    XmlContentException
    Indicates that client-submitted XML has an error, omission, or invalid structure.
